sentence.Network_en: The coffin had been draped in a Union Jack.
sentence.Network_cn: 灵柩上覆盖着英国国旗。

sentence.Network_en: A steady procession of people filed past the coffin.
sentence.Network_cn: 人们排成一队，一个接一个地从灵柩旁走过。

sentence.Network_en: Two reporters had to help lower the coffin into the grave.
sentence.Network_cn: 两名记者不得不帮忙把灵柩慢慢地放进墓穴中。

PerfectNetExp.abs: 141特战队_百度百科 ... 奇诺（ Chino） 棺材（coffin）（ Coffin） 沉睡（ Coma）.
用英语说中国菜 - sunquancai的日志 - 网易博客 ... 蚵仔煎 Oyster omelet 棺材板 Coffin 臭豆腐 Stinky tofu.
棺字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 棺架〖 bier〗 棺木〖 coffin;casket〗 棺材〖 coffin;casket〗.
职称英语A级词汇 - 豆丁网 ... coconut n. 椰子 coffin n. 棺材，灵柩 coil n. 线圈；(一)卷，(一)圈 v.卷， 盘绕.

list.abs: 微笑棺材（Laughing coffin） 艾恩葛朗特的杀人“红名公会”，在“PoH”的号召下组成，团员全都是以杀害玩家为乐的红人，在SAO玩家 …
coffee-mate 咖啡伴侣coffin cloth 寿衣呢coffin plank 棺材板
棺材角（coffin corner）(Coffin corner)又叫Q-Corner,是在某个特定高度失速速度等于临界马赫数。在这个高度下飞机几乎不能操纵。
nail的翻译中文意思-在线英汉词典 ... pare one's nails 修指甲 coffin nail 棺材钉 nail up a window 把窗钉死.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English (in the general sense 'box, chest, casket'): from Old French cofin 'little basket or case', from Latin cophinus (see coffer)

entry.def: A coffin is a box in which a dead body is buried or cremated.

entry.tran: 促使…失败（或完结）的因素
entry.def: If you say that one thing is a nail in the coffin of another thing, you mean that it will help bring about its end or failure.

example.ex: A fine would be the final nail in the coffin of the airline.
example.tran: 罚款将会是对这家航空公司的最后致命一击。

means.word_mean: 1. box in which a corpse is buried or cremated

sentences.en: The coffin lid had been screwed down.
The sight of the coffin sent a shudder through him.
sentences.cn: 看到那副棺材，他浑身一阵战栗。

sentences.en: They bore the coffin into the church.
The coffin was placed in the grave.
sentences.cn: 那口棺材已安放到坟墓里去了。

means.word_mean: 使某人早亡〔死,完蛋,垮台等〕之物

sentences.en: I missed the deadline again last week; I suppose that is another nail in my coffin.
sentences.cn: 上星期我又误了最后期限,我想那是另一个促使我完蛋的错误。
